roleset.name: cause to lose prestige
roleset.note: DISCREDIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discredit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from discredit.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: Mr. Murray also said Judge Hampton's comments didn't discredit the judiciary or the administration of justice.
example.arg: the judiciary or the administration of justice
